item.label: Country of Origin or State of Birth
Legal Description
item.num: NW4 NW4 Sec. 26; SE4 NW4, SE4 NE4 Sec. 27

list.head: Background Information
list.item: Comments: Final Certificate is actually "Soldier's Additional Entry Under Section 2306 of the Revised Statutes of the United States," addition to original homestead no. 15 Legal Description NE4 NE4 sec 20, town 3N, range 2E at the Chilacothe, Ohio, Land Office on 1863-01-08, which was cancelled 1870-12-01. Records of Military Service for John F. Heazlit. File also contains Assignment by Assignee of Laura Hamilton to James Sedwich, Non-Saline Affidavit, Application to United States Land Office by F. W. McReynolds, Affidavit of Assignee by James Ledwich/Sedwich, that he is the person named in the assignment by Laura Hamilton to J. Vance Lewis, Affidavit of assignment from Laura Hamilton to J. Vance Lewis, Certified Copy of Laura Hamilton's appointment as administratrix of the estate of John F. Heazlett, Affidavit of Anna E. Dawson, sister of John F. Heazlett, who homesteaded the SE4 NE4 sec 20 town 3N, range 2E, Certified Copy of Additional Homestead Rights Petition establishing the surviving heirs, Order of Court that John F. Heazlett was entitled to the additional homestead, Additional Homestead Proof by Legal Representative, Assignment by Legal Representative of Soldier's Additional Homestead Right. Stamped on the final certificate is the following: "Patent to contain reservation according to proviso to the Act of Aug. 30, 1890."
